content.question: The prevalence of the philosophy of positivism in much of European society in the latter half of the nineteenth century was most closely connected to which of the following?

choices.label: The continued influence of organized religion in the area of social reform
The appeal of radical challenges, such as Marxism and anarchism, to Europeâ€™s existing social order
Broad technological progress that was improving the lives of many Europeans
Conservative dominance of most European political systems

content.answer: Broad technological progress that was improving the lives of many Europeans
